#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
unsigned long p[500004],mod=10000;
bool mark[500004];
long long int t,n,i,j;
int main()
{
	for(i=1;i<=500004;i++)
	{
		p[i]=1;
	}
	for(i=2;i<=250002;i++) //seive for divisors(nice one) :)
	{
		for(j=i*2;j<500004;j+=i)
		{
			p[j]*=i;
			if(p[j]>=mod)
			{
				mark[j]=true;
				p[j]%=mod;
			}
		}
	}
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		if(mark[n])
		printf("%04lu\n",p[n]);
		else
		printf("%lu\n",p[n]);
	}
	return 0;
}
